transcript: Well, as I told you, it left Heathrow and it seems to have arrived here, but if you can't find it, then make sure you know what your bag looks like.

segments.text: Well, as I told you, it left Heathrow and it seems to have arrived here, but if you can't find it, then make sure you know what your bag looks like.

metadata.transcript_ground_truth: Well, as I told you, it left Heath Row and it seems to have arrived here.  But if you can't find it, then-are you sure you know what your bag looks like?
